Description: National Agricultural Marketing (known as: Thimar) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1996. Thimar operates within the Food and Staples Retailing sector focusing on Food Distributors. It has 2 subsidiaries operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Food Distributors and Agricultural Products. Thimar is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1988.
